column1: 1939 Gauge at 15 Acacia Grove NGR is here
1940 Sept 18 Gauge moved to Orchard Avenue
Orchard Av 250 to 400 yrds from 15 Acacia Ave depending which house 250yds most likely for elevation to match Acacia Grove
1948 Oct 20 Gauge moved to Acacia Grove Position only temporary until bombed garden is re-constituted
1949 Apr Gauge moved a few feet
1956 Note in BR Gauge over sheltered
